onrEvi:
Spirit Box 
Ghost Orbs 
Freezing Temperatures
onrTra:
The Onryo will blow out candles more frequently than other ghosts 
 
If there are multiple lit candles in a room, the Onryo will not be able to hunt. 
 
If you place a candle on top of a crucifix, with other candles nearby, the Onryo will prioritize blowing out the candle instead of using the crucifix.

Can Hunt at 50%.
onrAbi:
The Onryo can hunt at any sanity if it blows out the only lit candle in a room. This will first happen after it blew out 3 Candles! 
 
After 2 people have died, the Onryo has a 100% chance to hunt after blowing out the only lit candle nearby.
